post.body: I avoid shooter games for that very reason! lol... stupid death is such a waste of my time.
The boys are playing Mario Kart (Li'l Man's Xmas prez from Memaw) - one of the games I AM stupid at! :P
I personally found it to be one of the truest and most relate-able pictures of God in literature that I've seen for a long time.
Just for the sake of curiosity and discussion... which theological points? :)
Now THAT sounds heavenly!
you okay? :( thanks for coming over!
uh... you do know it's a holiday, right?
For anyone who cares... our cell phones no longer receive text messages... :)
Apparently my blog entry this morning has inspired personality confusion in others as well... Sorry about that: http://is.gd/dxUy
home from Christmas Number 2. Oh God, will I survive this?
Who Am I? http://is.gd/dxUy
woke this morning with a million words screaming in her head... again.
Melancholic Mistletoe Musings:http://is.gd/dvdJ
I Guess I Still Believe: http://is.gd/duCO
that last tweet was in relation to the game... physically, we're fine. lol... no worries please
we will not die without a fight... but we're dead anyway. :(
Playing LotR game: "I don't need 2 hearts; I'm not a time lord." Geektacular Christmas! :P
Installing new graphics software... :) Perfect Christmas activity! Geeks of the world unite!
is seriously trying to figure out whether Baby Girl is sick... entirely too much screaming and not enough sleeping recently. :(
Ok... better than @zoidland in a puppy suit is seeing him in a cheering skirt. LOL
